Detailed Description

Definition at line 25 of file Keyboard_menu.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Keyboard_menu::Keyboard_menu ( Game *  game  ) 

Set up the list of all available options that will be displayed onto the keyboard mapping screen.

Make sure you update Keyboard_menu::Event() to match the number of options here, else the undefined ones will have a default event of GAME_EVENT_NONE.
